de.unlixx.runpng.bitmap

Class Bitmap32Analyzer.Suggestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unlixx.runpng.bitmap.Bitmap32Analyzer.Suggestion
  • Enclosing class:
    Bitmap32Analyzer

    public class Bitmap32Analyzer.Suggestion
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an object with a suggestion how to save the analyzed bitmap or sequence.

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • needstRNS

        public boolean needstRNS()
        Tells whether the bitmap or sequence needs a tRNS chunk to save.
        Returns:
        True, if the bitmap or sequence needs a tRNS chunk to save.

      • gettRNSColor

        public int gettRNSColor()
        Gets the suggested tRNS color sample.
        Returns:
        An int containing the suggested tRNS color sample. Or -1 if not applicable.
